cards.title: Basic Play
cards.description: Draw 1, Play 1

cards.title: Sneakernet
cards.description: Everyone chooses one card to pass to the left.  If your hand is empty, you just receive a card (don’t have to draw or pass.

cards.title: Merger Consolidation
cards.description: Only 1 keeper is needed to win.

cards.title: Rich Bonus
cards.description: If one of your Keepers is a rich country, add 1 to all existing rules. (e.g. Draw 1 -> Draw 2)

cards.title: Poor Bonus
cards.description: If you have the fewest Keepers on the table, draw an extra card. In the case of a tie, both players get the bonus.

cards.title: Restoring a quorum
cards.description: Draw 2, Play 2.

cards.title: Government requires encrypted back doors
cards.description: Draw 1, Discard 4.

cards.title: Power outage
cards.description: All technology keepers cannot be used.

cards.title: Technical solution to a social problem
cards.description: Only technology keepers can be used.

cards.title: Power restored
cards.description: Replaces the Power Outage rule if in play.

cards.title: Recent terrorist attack
cards.description: Goals of Privacy, Legislative Win, Policy Change cannot be met while this rule is in play.

cards.title: Thwart the Surveillance Agencies
cards.description: If Full disk encryption is on the table, anyone can use it to win.

cards.title: Editorial Review
cards.description: Discard half of any individual player's hand. You pick who is under editorial review.

cards.title: Zero Day
cards.description: Take 1 card from up to half the players.

cards.title: Data breach
cards.description: One player has to show their hand.

cards.title: Ransomware
cards.description: Take all but 1 of one player's cards. You pick which player.

cards.title: Tech Hype!
cards.description: Everyone gets to draw a card.

cards.title: Privacy for All!
cards.description: The Privacy goal can be met with just 1 keeper.

cards.title: Zero Rating
cards.description: Play as many cards as you want on your turn.

cards.title: Classified information leaked
cards.description: The player holding Surveillance Agency has to play their keeper. Keeper limits are not enforced.

cards.title: Build an Alliance
cards.description: Count the number of players in the game (including yourself). Draw enough cards to give 1 card to each player, and then distribute them evenly amongst all the players. You decide who gets what.

cards.title: Redistribute the Wealth
cards.description: Gather up all the keepers on the table. Shuffle them together, then deal them out,giving the first card to yourself. Everyone will probably end up with a different number of Keepers in play than they started with.

cards.title: Today’s Special
cards.description: Set your hand aside and draw 3 cards. If today is your birthday, play all 3 cards. If today is a holiday or special anniversary, play 2 of the cards. If it’s just another day, play only 1 card. Discard the remainder.

cards.title: Congress changes hands
cards.description: Reset to Basic Rules. Discard all new rule cards, and leave only the basic rules in play. Do not discard the current Goal.
